column5: My home is on top of a hill overlooking downtown. For the time being (they are talking about moving soon) I am the first house to the left of the Hope Gallery which is one of the last remaining, sanctioned, graffiti parks in the country!  This home has a large, young, energetic dog and an adorable cat so if you have allergies or a fear of large animals, this might not be the space for you.
column8: Hip Hilltop Home in Downtown Austin
